Ray-Ban vs Oakley Founded in 1937, Ray-Ban is an American eyewear company. It is arguably the most popular high-end sunglasses brand in the world. The company is an automatic inclusion in any list of the best eyewear brands. Ray-Ban sunglasses are so hip that they’ve appeared in many movies, including “The Blues Brothers,” “Men in Black” and - perhaps most memorably - “Top Gun” arguably making them the best sunglasses for men. It was bought by Italian eyewear giant Luxottica in 1999 for $640 million. It is a popular brand among sunglasses enthusiasts and casuals. The Wayfarer, Clubmaster, and Aviator sunglasses are the most popular products offered by the company. Some sunglasses enthusiasts might argue that the quality of Ray-Ban suffered a drop-off after it was sold to Luxottica. Oakley represents the American dream in action. Today, the company is a leading manufacturer of sunglasses under the parent company Luxottica.
